name: ELISA S FERNÁNDEZ
hero-description: Soy diseñadora de producto UI UX.
top-choice-description: Vote and discover the trip you're looking for
blablacar-description: New feature for creating trip routines
about-me-1: Product designer and journalist with more than 10 years of experience in marketing and social media companies. I have worked as a photographer and journalist for national magazines such as El País or Forbes and as a video editor for brands such as Adidas, Iberdrola or Nivea.
about-me-2: Specializing in UX/UI allowed me to expand my knowledge and combine three of my main interests: communication, design and technology. The intensive UX/UI bootcamp at Ironhack has consolidated my creativity to create digital services focused on simplicity and functionality.
about-me-3: Thank you for reading and do not hesitate to contact me at
figma-info: For a better view of the prototype, click on the Figma icon in the bottom left corner
